description:
Automatically show optimized mobile keyboards based on field type: numeric keypad for phone numbers, email keyboard for emails, date picker wheels for dates, and searchable dropdowns for large select lists. Include input masks for formatted fields.

**Rationale:** Wrong keyboard types frustrate mobile users and slow data entry by 40%. Smart input methods reduce cognitive load, minimize errors, and leverage native mobile patterns that users already understand.
title: Adaptive Input Methods for Field Types
